c74object.name: cage.separatevoices
c74object.digest: Separate voices into new bach.roll or bach.score objects
c74object.description: Takes in input bach.roll's or bach.score's gathered syntaxes and outputs a list of gathered syntaxes, one for each voice.

inlet.description: The llll must contain the bach.roll's or bach.score's gathered syntax

outlet.digest: The wrapped gathered syntaxes of each of the voices

method.name: bang
method.description: Combines the most recently received input lllls.

method.name: llll
method.description: cage.separatevoices expects a bach.roll's or bach.score's gathered-syntax dump, and outputs the corresponding gathered syntax of each of its voices, wrapped in a level of parenthesis.

entry.name: Inlet 1 (llll)
entry.description: bach.score's or bach.roll's gathered syntax. The llll must contain the bach.roll's or bach.score's gathered syntax

entry.name: Outlet 1 (llll)
entry.description: The wrapped gathered syntaxes of each of the voices.
